title: Is FTP Totally Flawed & What Does That Mean? | GCN Show Ep. 511

media:group.media:title: Is FTP Totally Flawed & What Does That Mean? | GCN Show Ep. 511
media:group.media:description:
Cyclists love to talk about their FTP, or functional threshold power. Itâ€™s supposed to represent the theoretical maximum power you can hold for 60 minutes, but is that actually accurate? We spoke to training guru Professor Louis Passfield to find out. Si & Hank also look at the new Bianchi Oltre & S-Works Diverge, your hacks and bodges, and more!
